sentences.en: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?
sentences.cn: 若是义人仅仅得救,那不虔敬和犯罪的人, 将有何地可站 呢 .

sentences.en: Christ, while we were still helpless, yet died at the appointed time for the ungodly.
sentences.cn: 当我们还是软弱的时候, 基督就在预定的时刻为罪人死了.

sentences.en: Even the wrath of ungodly men brings praise to Him ( Ps. 76:10 ).
sentences.cn: 甚至祂能藉著恶人的忿怒,得著他应得的荣耀 ( 诗篇76篇10节 ).

sentences.en: For the ungodly, the Second Coming of Christ will be bad news indeed.
sentences.cn: 对那些不敬虔之人来说, 基督再次降临实际上是个坏消息.

sentences.en: He make a clean sweep of the ungodly nations.
sentences.cn: 他将清扫一切不信神的国.

sentences.en: He rang me up at this ungodly hour.
sentences.cn: 他的电话来得很不是时候.

sentences.en: I don't know who can be phoning us at this ungodly hour.
sentences.cn: 不知道谁打的电话,真不是时候.

sentences.en: I don't want a situation where this money will be used in an ungodly way.
sentences.cn: 我不想让这笔钱以不虔诚的方式使用.

sentences.en: Like the ungodly they maliciously mocked ; they gnashed their teeth at me.
sentences.cn: 他们如同席上好嬉笑的狂妄人向我咬牙.

sentences.en: Shall execrate you with the ungodly.
The ungodly are not so: but are like chaff which the wind driveth away.
sentences.cn: 恶人并不是这样,乃像糠秕被风吹散.

sentences.en: Why are you phoning at this ungodly hour ( of the night )?
sentences.cn: 你为什麽在 ( 夜里 ) 这个时候打电话来?

sentences.en: Why are you phoning at this ungodly hour?
sentences.cn: 你为什么在这个时候打电话来?

sentences.en: Why ring me up at this ungodly hour!
sentences.cn: 怎么在这时候打电话给我!

words.tran_cn: 邪恶的；不敬畏神的；荒唐的

trans.tran_en: showing a lack of respect for God
